group or a locator so that it's
self-contained within a safe bubble that
you constrain that bubble to the other
object. and you have to sort of like
nest things together to be able to still

control so that you know everything that
you do is preserved when you switch on
or off a constraint. It preserves what
you were doing. It doesn't snap back to
some weird rest position. It doesn't
change everything you did previously as
if the constraint has always been there.
